channel.title: INtopBackup
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from INtopBackup, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Lab mice may give 'first aid' to unconscious mates
item.description: New research suggests mice may exhibit revival-like behaviors to help unconscious mice recover faster.

item.title: What to know about failed Hamas return of Shiri Bibas' body, bus explosions in Israel
item.description: Israeli forces have announced that none of the bodies returned by Hamas Thursday belonged to Shiri Bibas, as originally believed. CBS News foreign cor...

item.title: New York Yankees drop beard ban after 49 years
item.description: The New York Yankees are changing their no-beard policy. Going forward, Yankees players will be allowed to have "well-groomed beards."

item.title: How Trump’s mass layoffs raise the risk of wildfires in the US West, according to fired workers

item.title: Body returned from Gaza is not Shiri Bibas, Israeli military says
item.description: Hamas said the hostage's remains seem to have been mixed up with other bodies and it is investigating.

item.title: Here's what a $70,000 HELOC costs monthly in 2025
item.description: Wondering what a $70,000 HELOC might cost you? Find out what your monthly payment could be.

item.title: Sinn Féin to boycott White House St Patrick's Day celebrations
item.description: First Minister Michelle O'Neill says her decision not to travel to Washington DC for the annual festivities is one of principle.

item.title: How LA wildfires are making an already tough rental market even worse
Sweden investigates suspected sabotage of undersea telecoms cable
item.description: A Baltic Sea cable has been damaged for the third time in recent months, Finnish telecom operators say.

item.title: Hamas failure to return body is new ceasefire setback
item.description: Israel says Hamas will pay the "full price" for handing over a body that is says was not that of Shiri Bibas.

item.title: Woman in court over McCann family stalking charges

item.title: What even IS art? The quiz doesn't know — but do you?
item.description: Plus: Why are there so many "Bridget Jones" movies? Who all resigned over the Eric Adams drama? And what phrase originated on "SNL"?
